title: Redwood National and State Parks: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Celebrate Our Centennial 2016 is the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service. Stay tuned for events among the redwood groves. Volunteer Redwood National Park has opportunities for all, in a variety of roles. Cooperating Association Making purchases at our bookstores and visitor centers directly supports, and helps fund park programs. Donations Citizens making contributions large and small has been at the heart of the protection of the redwood groves.              Â                Learn about volunteering at Redwood.               Celebrate 100 years: Find your park!               Join Redwood social media.               Kid and Youth activities.
